Chess Club.description: Learn strategies and compete in chess tournaments
Chess Club.full_description: Join our Chess Club to develop strategic thinking and problem-solving skills. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, you'll learn advanced tactics, compete in tournaments, and improve your game through regular practice sessions.

Programming Class.description: Learn programming fundamentals and build software projects
Programming Class.full_description: Dive into the world of coding! Learn Python, JavaScript, and web development. Build real projects, collaborate with peers, and prepare for tech careers or advanced CS courses.

Gym Class.full_description: Stay active and healthy! Our gym class offers a variety of physical activities including cardio, strength training, team sports, and fitness challenges.

Soccer Team.description: Join the school soccer team and compete in matches
Soccer Team.full_description: Be part of Mergington's competitive soccer team! Train with experienced coaches, compete against other schools, and develop teamwork and athletic skills.

Basketball Team.description: Practice and play basketball with the school team
Basketball Team.full_description: Join our basketball team and improve your skills through drills, scrimmages, and competitive games. All skill levels welcome!

Art Club.description: Explore your creativity through painting and drawing
Art Club.full_description: Unleash your artistic potential! Learn various painting and drawing techniques, work on personal projects, and showcase your art in our annual exhibition.

Drama Club.description: Act, direct, and produce plays and performances
Drama Club.full_description: Experience the magic of theater! Act in productions, learn stagecraft, and develop confidence through performance arts.

Math Club.description: Solve challenging problems and participate in math competitions
Math Club.full_description: Challenge yourself with advanced mathematics! Prepare for competitions, explore mathematical concepts beyond the curriculum, and connect with fellow math enthusiasts.

Debate Team.description: Develop public speaking and argumentation skills
Debate Team.full_description: Master the art of persuasion and critical thinking! Participate in debates, compete in tournaments, and develop essential communication skills for college and beyond.
